Package com.company.rest.products.controller

Class ProductController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.rest.products.controller.ProductController
  • @RestController
@Component
public class ProductController
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point to API. Decouples response and business logic by offloading all heavy lifting to BackendService, following an MVC pattern.
    See Also:
    BackendService, ResponseEntity, ResponseMessage

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        @GetMapping("/products")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> getAll​(@RequestParam(name="page",defaultValue="0")
                                                                       java.lang.Integer page,
                                                                       @RequestParam(name="items_in_page",defaultValue="10")
                                                                       java.lang.Integer size,
                                                                       @RequestParam(name="sort_by_field",defaultValue="costInCents")
                                                                       java.lang.String sortByField,
                                                                       @RequestParam(name="sort_order",defaultValue="ASC")
                                                                       java.lang.String sortOrder)
        Entry point for a GET ALL request.
        Parameters:
        page - the current index of the page in the paginated response.
        size - the number of items in the current page.
        sortByField - the field of LiteProduct which we will use for sorting the products.
        Returns:
        an appropriate JSON response.
        See Also:
        BackendService#getAllProducts(Integer, Integer, String)
